title: Palikoi/Palicorum Stagna
description: A pair of boiling lakes in Sicily, whose effervescence was attributed to the divine agency of the Palikoi.

properties.description: The Divine Palikoi, two lakes attributed as the brethren gods, the Palikoi, at the site of the ancient Palikon Limne/Palicorum Stagna
properties.title: The Divine Palikoi
